name: Cubetro
description:
Arcade endless retro wave cube runner,  it is  like flappy bird in 3D and it looks good.

If you get a HIGHSCORE  post screenshot of it in comments and I will update the table. Hope you have fun with it and don't lose your nerves.

Use your mouse and mouse left button to swerve the cube or speed and slow it down by dragging circular board in wanted direction.

All feedback is welcome, I more experimented with menu concept, so some aspect might still lack polish and will get it in next update with time.
